类 Advice.MethodSizeHandler.Default

  • java.lang.Object

    Advice.MethodSizeHandler

    public static class Advice.MethodSizeHandler.Default
extends Object
implements Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod
    A default implementation for a method size handler.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Default

        protected Default(MethodDescription instrumentedMethod,
                  TypeList requiredTypes,
                  TypeList yieldedTypes)
        Creates a new default meta data handler that recomputes the space requirements of an instrumented method.
        参数:
        instrumentedMethod - The instrumented method.
        requiredTypes - The types this meta data handler expects to be available additionally to the instrumented method's parameters.
        yieldedTypes - The types that are expected to be added after the instrumented method returns.

    • 方法详细资料

      • of

        protected static Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod of(MethodDescription instrumentedMethod,
                                                                   List<? extends TypeDescription> requiredTypes,
                                                                   List<? extends TypeDescription> yieldedTypes,
                                                                   int writerFlags)
        Creates a method size handler applicable for the given instrumented method.
        参数:
        instrumentedMethod - The instrumented method.
        requiredTypes - The list of types that the instrumented method requires in addition to the method parameters.
        yieldedTypes - A list of types that are yielded by the instrumented method and available to the exit advice.
        writerFlags - The flags supplied to the ASM class writer.
        返回:
        An appropriate method size handler.

      • bindEntry

        public Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForAdvice bindEntry(MethodDescription.InDefinedShape adviceMethod)
        从接口复制的说明: Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod
        Binds a method size handler for the entry advice.
        指定者:
        bindEntry 在接口中 Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod
        参数:
        adviceMethod - The method representing the entry advice.
        返回:
        A method size handler for the entry advice.

      • bindExit

        public Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForAdvice bindExit(MethodDescription.InDefinedShape adviceMethod,
                                                   boolean skipThrowable)
        从接口复制的说明: Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod
        Binds the method size handler for the exit advice.
        指定者:
        bindExit 在接口中 Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod
        参数:
        adviceMethod - The method representing the exit advice.
        skipThrowable - true if the exit advice is not invoked on an exception.
        返回:
        A method size handler for the exit advice.

      • compoundStackSize

        public int compoundStackSize(int stackSize)
        从接口复制的说明: Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod
        Computes a compound stack size for the advice and the translated instrumented method.
        指定者:
        compoundStackSize 在接口中 Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod
        参数:
        stackSize - The required stack size of the instrumented method before translation.
        返回:
        The stack size required by the instrumented method and its advice methods.

      • compoundLocalVariableLength

        public int compoundLocalVariableLength(int localVariableLength)
        从接口复制的说明: Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod
        Computes a compound local variable array length for the advice and the translated instrumented method.
        指定者:
        compoundLocalVariableLength 在接口中 Advice.MethodSizeHandler.ForInstrumentedMethod
        参数:
        localVariableLength - The required local variable array length of the instrumented method before translation.
        返回:
        The local variable length required by the instrumented method and its advice methods.
